step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Try to keep your shoulders relaxed down as you begin the roll.
Nice movement! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together as you roll them back and down.
Great job completing the first rep! Remember to breathe deeply when rolling your shoulders back.
Second rep starting well. Keep that gentle squeeze in your shoulder blades.
Excellent control! You're really getting the circular motion down.
Fantastic finish! You completed both reps with good form and controlled movement.

exercise_summary: Great job on your shoulder rolls! You're doing a good job of moving your shoulders in a circular motion. Remember to focus on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down, and take a deep breath as you do.
